@ leligal -  Its shot in old 'Academy ratio', which is 4:3, with cameras from the 80's in order for it to look visually authentic and incorporate the period's video footages to give it a documentary look.

Excellent film. Pablo Larrain is quickly becoming one of the best filmmaker working.
